metadata.title: CVE-2019-18934 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: Unbound 1.6.4 through 1.9.4 contain a vulnerability in the ipsec modulethat can cause shell code execution after receiving a specially craftedanswer. This issue can only be triggered if unbound was compiled with`--enable-ipsecmod` support, and ipsecmod is enabled and used in theconfiguration.

criterions.comment: unbound: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
